executable.title: Coherence Enhancing Anisotropic Diffusion (TubeTK)
executable.description: Performs coherence enhancing anisotropic diffusion: smooths flow-like structures (ex. vessels/tubes). Strong smoothing is performed in the direction of least intensity contrast (i.e. parallel to the tube). Implemented as described in Mendrik et al., Noise reduction in computed tomography scans using 3-D anisotropic diffusion with continuous switch, IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging, 28(10), pp. 1585-1594, 2009.
executable.contributor: Danielle F. Pace, Andinet Enquobahrie, Hua Yang, Stephen R. Aylward (Kitware)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

double.name: scaleParameter
double.label: Scale
double.description: Scale at which first derivatives are calculated when determining the structure tensor and gradient magnitude. If set too low, filter will be overly sensitive to noise. If set too high, small structures will not be well preserved.

double.name: cedContrastParameter
double.label: CED Contrast
double.description: Ratio between the second and third eigenvalues that indicates a tube-like structure. If set too low, small spherical structures will not be preserved. If set too high, tubular structures will not be filtered.

double.name: alpha
double.label: Alpha
double.description: Regularization parameter to ensure that the diffusion tensor matrix is positive definite and to prevent division by zero. Should be set to something very small.

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: Number of iterations used in optimization.
